summary: When a dysfunctional group of unpublished writers accept Hannah into their fold, the last thing they expect is her overnight success. Can these lovable misfits achieve their artistic dreams and avoid killing one another in the process?
cast: Tricia Helfer|Kaley Cuoco|Jonathan Banks|Teri Polo|Chris Klein|Jonathan Bennett|Dylan Walsh|Dennis Farina|Charlene Amoia|Meagen Fay|Diane Robin|Daniel Riordan|Robb Skyler|John Griffin|Scott Ford
title: Authors Anonymous
